comments:
Build 20040302

1. Double-click in the ruler to create a breakpoint.
2. The breakpoint appears in the breakpoints view and the ruler immediately.
3. Right click on the breakpoint in the ruler right away.
4. The property page comes up in a really bad state (nothing but two checkboxes are visible) and 
the following is dumped to the log:

org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Breakpoint does not have an associated marker.
